reviewText: Here is the sitcom that millions worldwide watched on Thursday nights and talked about all day and all night Friday. This is the family that mirrored series star-comedian Bill Cosby's own. This is the sitcom that was set and filmed in Brooklyn,New York(Cosby refused to do the show in California due to very long distance between there and his Shelbourne,Massachusetts home). Cosby was an NBC veteran when this premiered in 1984 on the same network. His earlier series I SPY and THE BILL COSBY SHOW were aired by NBC. His animated series FAT ALBERT AND THE COSBY KIDS had ended its 12-year run on CBS just before this series premiered. I will not elaborate since I already had before. Here you get 49 episodes,24 season 1 episodes and 25 season 2 episodes. Season 1 finished at #3 and season 2 rose to #1 and stayed there for the following 4 seasons. Previously,CBS's ALL IN THE FAMILY was the #1 series for five straight seasons. Guest stars include Doris Belack,jazz musician Dizzy Gillespie,singers Tony Orlando and the recently-deceased Lena Horne.

reviewText: I felt getting the first four seasons for these bargain prices was too good to pass up ... in addition, they arrived much earlier than promised by the seller. I will definitely consider purchasing product from this seller if the opportunity arises in the future.The show itself was one of the best & down to earth comedies ever produced ... and did so without the in your face sexual innuendo that so many of today's comedies contain ... that's not to say that today's comedies are bad ... but shows like "The Cosby Show"  are unique !!
summary: One of the all-time great TV shows !

reviewText: I had to give this terrific TV show 4 stars only due to product issues. There is something wrong with the sound channels, many times the left or right channel goes much fainter, I have noticed when there is a camera change, is also when the sounds cut low. It happens from Season 1 to about season 6. I watch this, along with Roseanne and Sinfeld, when I go to bed so I have head phones one. The other two TV shows has no issues with the sound, so I know it's not my DVD player. I am now watching the Cosby series again for the second time since I bought these, the sound is still an issue, it's very very annoying. I'm rather disappointed in that. So, with that, this is a review about the products, the physical product would only get something like a 1 star, the THE COSBY SHOW product, the show itself, certainly gets a 5 stars.

reviewText: The Cosby Show will always get a 5 out of 5 from me, no matter what. And these DVDs are great. Two seasons for the price of one = foolproof. The SEASON 1 set that I got is the 2011 version by Millennium Entertainment and from what I've read online, the episodes are now uncut, and the last disc features the bonus stuff from the "complete series" release. SEASON 2 is from First Look Entertainment (the 2006 release) and is also said to be uncut. My only complaints: The SEASON 1 set does not contain a slipcover like SEASON 2, and when watching SEASON 1 I noticed that the video quality would change within certain scenes and then get better again. Could've been better restored, but I have been waiting for a long time to get this show on DVD and I'm thrilled to have it in my collection despite those flaws.*SEASON 2 AUDIO INFO* - With season 2 I have been experiencing audio issues. The audio will shift from Dolby Digital to Dolby Pro Logic every time I start an episode or pause it. In fact, just going to the menu caused it to do the same thing. I don't know if it's my receiver or the discs themselves, but I wanted to mention it so if anyone else has this same problem, then they'd know that it's not just them.
summary: My favorite television show of all time (and I'm a 90s kid).
Title: N/A
